channel.description: Recent content in OOP on Sorush Khajepor - Numerical programming and app development

item.title: Is C++ static polymorphism useful?
item.description: With examples, I explain static vs dynamic polymorphism. I show that static one limits the flexibility of the program at runtime. However, it can improve the performance of the code whose behaviour can be resolved at compile-time.
